menus: import functools; selected_points = [p for p in C.object.data.splines.active.bezier_points if p.select_control_point]; sum = functools.reduce(lambda x, y: x + y.radius, selected_points, 0); mean_radius = sum / len(selected_points); return mean_radius
[setattr(p, "radius", value) for p in C.object.data.splines.active.bezier_points if p.select_control_point]

import functools; selected_points = [p for p in C.object.data.splines.active.bezier_points if p.select_control_point]; sum = functools.reduce(lambda x, y: x + y.weight_softbody, selected_points, 0); mean_weight = sum / len(selected_points); return mean_weight
[setattr(p, "weight_softbody", value) for p in C.object.data.splines.active.bezier_points if p.select_control_point]

import functools; selected_points = [p for p in C.object.data.splines.active.bezier_points if p.select_control_point]; sum = functools.reduce(lambda x, y: x + y.tilt, selected_points, 0); mean_tilt = sum / len(selected_points); return mean_tilt
[setattr(p, "tilt", value) for p in C.object.data.splines.active.bezier_points if p.select_control_point]
